description: This lentil traybake is packed with sweet and savoury flavours with a rich miso sauce.
name: Miso Root Vegetable & Lentil Traybake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 large lemons, 1 sliced, 1 juiced and zested

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200Â°C. Tip the vegetables into a large roasting tin and toss with the oil. Roast for 10 minutes, add the lemon slices and roast for 25 more minutes, tossing halfway through cooking.
Whisk the miso paste, lemon juice, zest and honey together in a small bowl. Pour over the vegetables and cook for 10 minutes more until caramelised and sticky.
Heat the lentils according to pack instructions, stir into the roasting tin along with the spinach and walnuts and serve.
